start: Welcome! Use /help to see available commands.
help:
Here are the available commands:
/start - Start the bot
/help - Show this help message
/register - Set your city
/set_language - Change language
/set_settings - Update your preferences
/stop - Pause notifications
/delete_account - Remove your account

registration.success: Registration successful! Please set your city using /register [city name]
registration.distance_prompt: How far would you like to search? (in km)

settings.language_changed: Your language has been changed to English.
settings.city_set: Your city has been set to {city}.
settings.distance_set: Your search distance has been set to {distance} km.

errors.unknown_command: Sorry, I didn't understand that command.
errors.invalid_city: Sorry, I couldn't find that city. Please try again.
errors.invalid_distance: Please enter a valid distance (1-100 km).
errors.missing_parameters: Missing required information. Please try again.
errors.service_unavailable: Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

account.stopped: Your account has been paused. Use /start to resume.
account.deleted: Your account has been deleted. All your data has been removed.
account.reactivated: Welcome back! Your account has been reactivated.

proposals.no_matches: No new matches found. We'll notify you when something comes up!
